content.rendered:
A timeless classic! Our phalaenopsis orchid stems make the perfect gift of luxury, effortlessly bringing a sense of tranquility and sophistication to any living space. Long lasting when conditioned regularly and symbolic of pure love, beauty, and elegance.

Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon OR with the option to add a contemporary ‘Marmoset Found’ vase.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one of a kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The phalaenopsis orchids you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest phalaenopsis orchids to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.

Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon…
